note: Phase 1: 1 house/week (JV Greenblocks). CoE COD at M18. R130k/month labor.
Phase 2 ramp-up: 3 houses/week (Optimat panel machines). EUR 200k investment.
Phase 2 full production. Smart City offtake begins.
Phase 2 steady state (156/yr = 3/week). CoE sold to LLC at 10% premium.
Training stops after CoE sale to LLC.
Phase 3 feasibility study (EUR 500k Finnvera). 13 houses/week capacity.
45000 houses = full Lanseria Smart City buildout
